2018年视频:为什么《纸片马里奥》系列已经不行了 本帖最后由 医生狼多 于 2020-5-15 15:42 编辑
……看来没多少人会点进去看了才回复
中文字幕:https://b23.tv/rFuYsa
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KOk2QxDIW6c
原投稿主：SuperMarioT
翻译/字幕：哆啦梅度六世
简介：
If you're a curious/avid Mario fan, let alone Paper Mario, you're gonna wanna see this.
What hapened to Paper Mario? Why did it change like this? What was Miyamoto thinking? Is he a bigger detriment than we thought, or not as harmful as we think? What's wrong with Risa Tabata? Are they innocent? Is Kensuke Tanabe to blame? Where's Ryota Kawade? Is Yoshiaki Koizumi in the right? Who tf are these people? Lots of questions are answered to those curious on why and how Paper Mario changed as it did since Super.
